benchmark_details.name: WebApp1K: A Practical Code-Generation Benchmark for Web App Development
benchmark_details.overview: WebApp1K is a practical code-generation benchmark designed to measure LLM ability to develop web apps. It aims to calibrate LLM output and improve code correctness and functionality.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To benchmark LLM performance in practical application development.

data.source: Human curated and LLM synthesized user journeys depicting unique user journeys for web applications.
data.annotation: Combination of human curation and data synthesis by LLMs.

methodology.calculation: Calculated as the number of problems solved correctly within a certain number of attempts.
methodology.interpretation: Higher pass@k scores indicate better performance in generating correct code for the problems.
methodology.validation: The benchmark is validated through performance results from evaluating various LLMs.
